Package com.hexaware.dao.service

Interface IReservationService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ReservationServiceImpl
public interface IReservationService
The IReservationService interface provides methods for interacting with the Reservation entity. This interface defines operations such as retrieving reservation information by ID or customer ID, creating a new reservation, updating an existing reservation, and canceling a reservation.

  • Method Details

    • getReservationByID

      void getReservationByID(int reservationID)
      Retrieves reservation information by ID.
      Parameters:
      reservationID - The unique identifier of the reservation.

    • getReservationByCustomerID

      void getReservationByCustomerID(int customerID)
      Retrieves reservation information by customer ID.
      Parameters:
      customerID - The unique identifier of the customer.

    • createReservation

      void createReservation(Reservation reservation)
      Creates a new reservation.
      Parameters:
      reservation - The Reservation object containing the details of the new reservation to be created.

    • updateReservation

      void updateReservation(Reservation reservation)
      Updates an existing reservation.
      Parameters:
      reservation - The Reservation object containing the updated details of the reservation.

    • cancelReservation

      void cancelReservation(int reservationID)
      Cancels a reservation by ID.
      Parameters:
      reservationID - The unique identifier of the reservation to be canceled.

    • getTotalCostForCustomer

      void getTotalCostForCustomer()
      Calculates and retrieves the total cost for a customer. This method should be implemented to calculate and retrieve the total cost associated with a specific customer.
